segments.text: My Buddha ! ! It's beautiful ! But I thought you were afraid ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Actually , I was watching your auction all along . I saw you drop out at $ 250 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I watched Buddha buyer go up to $ 315 . I waited until the very last minute and then I jumped in at $ 325 ! I sniped him !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But that's a lot of money ! Honey !
segments.speaker: S1
